name: Between life and death (Demo)
description:
Between life and death (Demo) is kind of a prototype for a full game I'm currently working on.

This demo contains a level that shows some of the mechanics I've implemented in this game. Can you complete it?

Controls:

W, A, S, DMove (forwards, backwards, left, right)SpacebarJumpCTRLCrouch, slideMouse1GrappleEInteract

Please note: 

This level doesn't have anything to do with the story for the full game!

This demo was submitted for the "Finally Finish Something 2022" game jam.

If you found any bugs please report them in the comments below.

This is the first game I have ever published.

I had some issues with lightmapping, so there currently is no lightmap in the scene.

I would also like to recieve some feedback on the game so I know if I should continue working on the full version of it.
